full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title

- **English Title**: G9292-241740-001-XU-A - TBIPS Tier 2 RFP - ESDC SAP Renewal
- **French Title**: DP de niveau 2 des SPICT - Renouvellement du SAP d’ESDC

### Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of information technology consultation services. Specifically, the project involves the renewal of the SAP system of the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC).

### Tender Details

- **Solicitation Number**: WS3560864636
- **Request for Proposal (RFP) Number**: G9292-241740-001-XU-A
- **Publication Date**: October 27, 2022
- **Closing Date**: December 5, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EST
- **Amendment Date**: November 30, 2022

### Contractor Requirements

- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Additional Information

- **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Point of Contact**: Valerie Holmes, SPAC/PSPC
- **Email**: valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Documents

*   The tender notice is available on [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483779?extsite=MTQ0ODM3NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 5, 2022 by 2:00 p.m. EST.

Note: This advertisement is intended to solicit proposals from qualified contractors. Only responsive proposals received by the specified closing date and time will be considered. Failure to submit the proposal by the specified closing time may result in the bid being declared non-responsive. 

Ce message publicitaire est destiné à recenser des offres de partenaires qualifis. Seules les offres répondant à l’appel d’offres qui sont recevables avant la date et l’heure précises énoncées
